_header: Jesu full of all virtues / Said to the people of the Jews
Subjects: sermon texts, Gospel; Cross, feast of the Exaltation of
_description: Gospel, ‘In festo Exaltationis Crucis’, in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
Ihesu ful of alle vertuwesSeide to þe pepul of þe
                    Iewes…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…He þat for vs wolde dyeBring vs vp to heuene hiȝe
                    Amen
BodEngPoeta1.Attributed Title:
Liber generacionis Ihesu Cristi fili / Hunc indicium est mundi (f.
                        224vc)
